parameters.name: CipherSuite
parameters.description:
The type of the cipher suites. Valid values:

*   **1**: all cipher suites.
*   **2**: strong cipher suites.
*   **99**: custom cipher suites.

parameters.name: CustomCiphers
parameters.description: The custom cipher suites that you want to add. This parameter is available only if you set **CipherSuite** to **99**.

parameters.name: EnableTLSv3
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to support TLS 1.3. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the WAF instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: the Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: TLSVersion
parameters.description:
The version of the TLS protocol. Valid values:

*   **tlsv1**
*   **tlsv1.1**
*   **tlsv1.2**
